thread.title: Holly Willoughby left blushing as Nigel Havers interviews her and flirts - even inviting her on holiday!
thread.title_full: Holly Willoughby left blushing as Nigel Havers interviews her and flirts - even inviting her on holiday!

author: Hayley Minn
title: Holly Willoughby left blushing as Nigel Havers interviews her and flirts - even inviting her on holiday!
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Holly Willoughby was left blushing on This Morning as Nigel Havers began interviewing HER and chatting her up. 
The former Coronation Street actor switched places with the ITV daytime presenter in order to quiz her. 
He said: “I saw you last night being interviewed. 
“It must be so different to be interviewed. Why don’t we swap for a minute?” 
A giggly Holly agreed, and said: “This feels really weird! Read More (Photo: ITV) (Photo: ITV) 
He first asked her about her appearance on The One Show, where she got “goosed by Noo-Noo” from the Teletubbies. 
Nigel then turned to Phil and said: “I quite like sitting here I have to say, do you make a few bob?” 
And then he took the opportunity to make his move and charm Holly’s socks off. 
With a smile on his face, smooth operator Nigel asked: “Hows it going? What are you doing for the rest of the day? (Photo: ITV) 
“How about a spot of lunch?” 
Taken aback, Phil asked incredulously: “Are you chatting her up? You can’t chat up the guests! 
“No! It’s unacceptable. You smoothy.” Read More (Photo: ITV) (Photo: ITV) 
As they laughed and Nigel returned to his original seat, a blushing Holly said: “That was very slick well done.” 
But Nigel wasn’t finished there, as he leaned across and said to Holly: “Any time you want a holiday, look I’m just touching your knee.” 
Holly excitedly said: “Are you inviting me on holiday? Look I’ve got lunch, I’ve got a holiday, this is fantastic.” 
*This Morning continues on ITV1 weekdays at 10.30am Like us on Facebook
